jb build .
jb build . --builder pdflatex
cp ./_build/latex/output.pdf ./_build/html/cours_proba.pdf
git add ./_build/html/cours_proba.pdf
git commit -m "ajout du pdf"
git push origin main

ghp-import -n -p -f _build/html


========
